overview: David Compton, Chairman and CEO, has a strong background in both consumer packaged goods and the Internet. Prior to founding NetPlenish, Dave founded and, from 2005 through 2009, served as President and CEO of Aquea Scientific Corp., a specialty product development and formulation company focused on the health and beauty industry. While at Aquea, Dave raised more than $13 million in Series A and Series B financings and successfully commercialized the company’s core product with the Alberto Culver Company (NYSE: ACV). Prior to Aquea, Dave spent more than 10 years in senior positions in the financial industry, including Executive Vice President of TradingMarkets.com, one of the largest online providers of proprietary trading information and literature to the financial markets, and CEO of Opportunities in Options, Inc., a leading commodities brokerage firm.
